Simultaneous Dual-Band
10/100 Ethernet
[http://www.engeniustech.com/resources/ESR-7750_DataSheet.pdf Datasheet]
[http://www.smallnetbuilder.com/wireless/wireless-reviews/31142-new-to-the-charts-engenius-esr7750-300mbps-dual-band-wireless-n-router On SmallNetBuilder] The [http://www.dd-wrt.com/wiki/index.php/Supported_Devices DD-WRT wiki] lists the Sitecom WL-328 as being an ESR7750. *http://www.dd-wrt.com/phpBB2/viewtopic.php?t=142085 ==Pictures==
